title: Smashed table

properties.name: description
properties.value: A smashed table  is found in Ah Za Rhoon during the Shilo Village quest. The player can look at it, which produces the dialogue "This table might be useful with some adjustment." and attempting to craft it offers the player three options: a ladder, a crude raft and a pole vault.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Smashed table (Shilo Village)The RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Smashed table
Smashed table
Released27 January 2003 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestShilo Village
LocationAh Za Rhoon
OptionsLook-at, Craft
ExamineThis table has seen better days.
Map
Advanced data
Object ID2226

A smashed table is found in Ah Za Rhoon during the Shilo Village quest. The player can look at it, which produces the dialogue "This table might be useful with some adjustment." and attempting to craft it offers the player three options: a ladder, a crude raft and a pole vault.

Only a raft can be crafted, granting 5 Crafting experience, but it becomes uncraftable afterwards, producing the dialogue "There isn't enough wood left in this table to make anything!". Choosing either incorrect option twice also makes the table uncraftable. The resulting raft can be boarded in order to escape Ah Za Rhoon. Alternatively, players may walk south and exit through the waterfall, or simply teleport out.

A '''smashed table ''' is found in [[Ah Za Rhoon]] during the [[Shilo Village]] quest. The player can look at it, which produces the dialogue "This table might be useful with some adjustment." and attempting to craft it offers the player three options: a ladder, a [[crude raft]] and a pole vault.

Only a raft can be crafted, granting 5 [[Crafting]] experience, but it becomes uncraftable afterwards, producing the dialogue "There isn't enough wood left in this table to make anything!". Choosing either incorrect option twice also makes the table uncraftable.<!-- Choosing ladder produces the dialogue "Your experience in crafting tells you that there isn't enough wood to complete this task." and choosing pole vault produces _____ --> The resulting raft can be boarded in order to escape Ah Za Rhoon. Alternatively, players may walk south and exit through the waterfall, or simply teleport out.
